subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Woody Austin is one of the streakier players in golf, capable of long binges of birdies and bogeys alike. As well as he strikes a ball, Austin can also be sharp taking jabs at himself.
snippet: Woody Austin is one of the streakier players in golf, capable of long binges of birdies and bogeys alike. As well as he strikes a ball, Austin can also be sharp taking jabs at himself.
